dc_title_s: Plan of the city of Detroit; S. Augustus Mitchell.
dc_description_s: North oriented to upper right corner of map. Shows railroads and some buildings. Plate 80 of Mitchell's New General Atlas. "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1882 by S. Augustus Mitchell in the Office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington." General map of state of Michigan on verso (plate 79). 1 map: color; 39 x 31 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
